definition: doubly homesick for our dear ones at each festive day (from a poem by Wang Wei 王維|王维[Wang2 Wei2])
pinyin: mei3 feng2 jia1 jie2 bei4 si1 qin1

definition: see 每況愈下|每况愈下[mei3 kuang4 yu4 xia4]

sentences.english: So every book catalog has a title card.
sentences.chinese: 這麼說，目錄櫃中每本書都有一張書名卡。

sentences.english: Each Olympic Games, is the Greek festival of people .
sentences.chinese: 每一屆奧林匹克運動會，都是全希臘人民的節日。

sentences.english: Finding should change standard of care, which is 4 doses every 3 weeks, researchers say.
sentences.chinese: 研究員說該發現將改變每3周4次給藥的治療標準。

sentences.english: Yes. A specific subject-selection system allows the training coordinator to select relevant subjects for each target group.
sentences.chinese: 可以根據每一個目標羣設定相關的培訓主題。

sentences.english: One in 3 domestic passengers chooses China Southern Airlines on average.
sentences.chinese: 中國平均每3個民航旅客就有1個選擇南航。

sentences.english: Even the GOD cannot guarantee everyone would be better.
sentences.chinese: 上帝也不能保祐每一個人。

sentences.english: Into every life some rain must fall.
sentences.chinese: 每私人一生都得逢上陰雨。

sentences.english: Each catalog covers a lot of sub-factors.
sentences.chinese: 而每一大類中又可細分爲很多小的影響因素。

sentences.english: There are also the purely personal predilections of each individual musician.
sentences.chinese: 每一個音樂家都有完全個人的偏愛。

sentences.english: All the Arsenal staff and everyone else have helped me.
sentences.chinese: 所有的阿森納工作人員和每一個其他人都在幫助我。

sentences.english: Once you open a page, it has formatting functions just as in word processor.
sentences.chinese: 每一個新頁面都有與文書處理機相同的格式化功能。

sentences.english: Everyone in the energy business believes that carbon-pricing will come, but when?
sentences.chinese: 能源行業的每一個人都認爲將會對碳定價，但何時呢？

sentences.english: Repeat this procedure until every pattern piece has been individually traced-off.
sentences.chinese: 重複這道程序，直到每一張衣片紙樣獨立描下。

sentences.english: A substitution matrix lets you assign match scores individually to each pair of symbols.
sentences.chinese: 使用置換矩陣能夠根據每對符號單獨分配匹配得分。

sentences.english: Iwill look for every chance to speak English.
sentences.chinese: 我會尋求每一個機會來說英語。

sentences.english: Other chapters are available in our e-Library.
sentences.chinese: 在隨後的章節裏，我們將分別考察每一個因素。

definition: gap/interval/compartment/to divide/to separate/to leave a gap of (two weeks, three meters etc)
that level or higher/that amount or more/the above-mentioned/(used to indicate that one has completed one's remarks) That is all.
